name: help the duck Water sliding
description:
Help the duck is an arcade game to spend time with a simple and addictive water slide challenge.

- Purpose of the game:
The goal is to help the duck with water to slide down to bath and save the duck!!


- How to play:
Click the right of the screen to move the water slide tube to the right soap.


It is an easy game, but that requires a lot of attention, especially when this with a high score!
